name: discounted_cash_flow_models_dcf_s
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool marketci_analytics.
Tool description: Stock Market Endpoint for Price Forecasts, Probability, Cash Flow Models , and Peer Comps 
API description: Fetches the Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) model for a given stock symbol using MarketCI Analytics API.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which to fetch the DCF model.
